title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST & CLI API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (pip: langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models as LangChain LLMs/embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready).

title: continue
summary: VS Code & JetBrains plugin that adds local LLM coding assistance via Ollama.

title: llama-cpp-python
summary: Python bindings for llama.cpp with built-in Ollama-compatible server mode (pip: llama-cpp-python[server]).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators/embedders.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Browser userscript that turns GitHub Copilot suggestions into local Ollama completions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history & prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community-maintained Node.js client for Ollama (npm: ollama-node).

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing async/sync clients for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client library for Ollama (go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go).
